thread.title: Amelia

author: Amelia
title: Amelia
text: Setting up my account and arranging for the installment was one of the best phone interactions I have had with a service provider. Damien was very friendly, personable, and arranged my services in a very smooth and painless manner. I usually dread calling for services like this but he made it enjoyable. I wish everyone you had to talk to on the phone for such reasons was like him!
